post.body: @qwertyjuan what's up with walking zombies?.. aren't we all supposed to be relaxing waiting for christmas? hmmmm
@vernieman why are you guys still up so late?
looks like I'm not the only one with this problem... I use a SE w910. just restart the phone and it works. does that work for you?
@dannyfoo @qwertyjuan I thought turkeys were for thanksgiving? anyways... I'm good anytime except weekends till chritsmas.
got your mail... will get right on it. :D
the durians are doing fine, but haven't had any lately, extremely heaty. And what's up with the Komtar tower?
I iz a walking zombee 2day, GarrrrrrR!

hmmmm great.. just when I plan to get some work done over the night in the office, streamyx decides to slow down to a crawl.
had to rush back to the office at 11:30pm to send some backup files to a client, the things I do for my clients... sigh...
hates it when after a windows update, it keep prompting you to restart the computer every 5 minutes...

is working with good tempo... rocking to ghost in the shell and samurai champloo OST with bits of NIN Ghost mixed in between!
asks why does Gmail notifier needs "Registry Editing" to switch to https mode? I'm appalled. http://bit.ly/1R3a
has just realized that it has been 2 months since I've installed firefox on this com... looks like chrome is doing nicely.
